title: Utility Schema Functions
description: A file containing various utility functions for Pf2eTools.

alignmentNames.description:
L: Lawful
 N: Neutral
 NX: Neutral (law/chaos axis)
 NY: Neutral (good/evil axis)
 C: Chaotic
 G: Good
 E: Evil
 U: Unaligned
 A: Any

tags.description: Tags used in abilities and "data" entries. Defines what type of entry to draw data from.

alignmentTags.description:
CE: Chaotic Evil
CG: Chaotic Good
CN: Chaotic Neutral
LE: Lawful Evil
LG: Lawful Good
LN: Lawful Neutral
N: Neutral
NE: Neutral Evil
NG: Neutral Good

special.$comment: For special cases that require a custom string.

freq.$comment: In code return "Once" if =1, "Twice" if =2, and "`n` times" otherwise.
freq.description: How frequent it is; once, twice etc.

recurs.$comment: Assume false unless provided. If provided, render "every" instead of "per".

overcharge.$comment: Assume false unless provided. If provided, render ", plus overcharge".
overcharge.description: Adds ", plus overcharge"; used for Wands.

interval.description: The number of units e.g. every *three* hours.

unit.$comment: If "interval" is provided and > 1, then return the plural form of the unit.

customUnit.description: Name of a custom unit, use the correct single/plural form.

skillBonus.$comment: Just keeping this around in case we want it later, currently unused

visible.description: Governs whether or not the class name is visible in the list display/prerequisite line. *Not* recommended for features which implicitly carry a class restriction, such as Eldritch Invocations.
Governs whether or not the class name is visible in the list display/prerequisite line. *Not* recommended for features which implicitly carry a class restriction, such as Eldritch Invocations.

otherSummary.description: A free text prerequisite, with a shortened form for list display.

displayEntry.description: Optional long-form name to be used in the rendered entity.

spellcasting2020.description: Renders with the updated text found in UA2020: Feats

note.description: An additional note that accompanies the proficiencies, but is not part of them.

X.description: An array of levels to which the spell can be heightened.

^([1-9]|10)$.description: An array of effects of heightening the spell to the given level.

defenses.$comment: HP will NOT match for creatures.

anyOf.$comment: This is a custom pre-processor tag, which merges together the array of objects into one. This allows proper inheritance, which JSON schema don't really do.

props.description: If unspecified, defaults to `[null, "entries", "headerEntries", "footerEntries"]`. To apply to _any_ string, including those outside of sub-properties (for instance, when trying to replace text in an array of plain strings), include `null` as one of the props (i.e. `"props": [null]`)
